name: Ice Skate Rush
description:
Don't you hate it when you're trying to enjoy a nice winter day by ice skating on the frozen lake, but it's full of polar bears, wolves and yetis?

Ice Skate Rush is a FREE, simple and addicting game that's fun for all ages. Help your character avoid being torn apart by the dangers on the ice!

How far can you go? How much hot chocolate can you collect along the way? Collect those power-ups to help you out even more!

Collect enough hot chocolate and you can unlock other characters for even more fun!


*** FEATURES ***

* Incredible endless gameplay means a new game every time
* Collect hot chocolate to unlock more characters
* Simple game controls good for both kids and adults
* Amazing graphics
* Game Center enabled
* Universal app supports iPhone / iPad / iPod Touch


Download Ice Skate Rush right now while it's 100% FREE!
